data.Title: TPW Meeting Glasgow and Oak Grove Roads
data.Description:
Join us at the upcoming public meeting to learn about street upgrades. This project is located in Council District 8.
The City of Fort Worth Transportation and Public Works (TPW) Department will present upcoming street improvements at the
Highland Hills Neighborhood Association meeting.

Thursday, February 1, 2024 at 6:00 p.m.

Address.Formatted: Highland Hills Community Center, 1600 Glasgow Road, Fort Worth, 76134
